field.description:
Enable check_mk Agent on this server. This will check all config options to run check_mk binary on your system.
Reference:
https://github.com/sileht/check_mk/tree/master/doc

Latest check_mk version: fetch -o /usr/local/bin/check_mk_agent 'http://git.mathias-kettner.de/git/?p=check_mk.git;a=blob_plain;f=agents/check_mk_agent.freebsd;hb=HEAD'
Enter port to listen on. Leave empty to use Default prot 6556
Enter hosts(comma separeted) that can communicate with this agent.
